TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed JumpList extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public NotInheritable Class JumpList Implements ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 表示項目及工作清單，此項目及工作會顯示成為 Windows 7 工作列按鈕上的功能表。

span.span: Represents a list of items and tasks displayed as a menu on a Windows 7 taskbar button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]工作列提供直接從工作列按鈕啟動程式，使用捷徑清單的增強的功能。The [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar provides enhanced functionality for starting programs directly from the taskbar button by using Jump Lists. 捷徑清單也會在[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]開始 功能表。Jump Lists are also used in the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] Start menu. 以滑鼠右鍵按一下工作列按鈕，或按一下 [開始] 功能表中的程式旁的箭號，您可以存取的捷徑清單。You access a Jump List by right-clicking a taskbar button or by clicking the arrow next to a program in the Start menu. 如需跳躍清單的詳細資訊，請參閱[工作列](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178478)Windows 使用者經驗的互動指導方針一節。For more information about Jump Lists, see the [Taskbar](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178478) section of the Windows User Experience Interaction Guidelines. 類別中的捷徑清單功能會提供 managed 包裝函式[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]工作列及管理資料傳遞至[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]殼層。The class provides a managed wrapper for the Jump List functionality in the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar and manages the data passed to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell. 所公開的功能類別不是適用於版本[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]早於[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]。The functionality exposed by the class is not available in versions of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] earlier than [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]. 使用應用程式類別會以其他版本的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]，但跳躍清單將無法使用。Applications that use the class will run in other versions of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)], but the Jump List will not be available. 如需有關 Windows shell 和原生跳躍清單 Api 的詳細資訊，請參閱[工作列延伸模組](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178479)。For more information about the Windows shell and native Jump List APIs, see [Taskbar Extensions](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178479). 下圖顯示跳躍清單適用於 Windows Media Player，使用中的項目**任務**並**經常**類別。The following illustration shows the Jump List for Windows Media Player, with items in the **Tasks** and **Frequent** categories. ![Windows Media Player 跳躍清單](~/add/media/wpfshell-jumplist.png "Windows Media Player 跳躍清單")![Windows Media Player Jump List](~/add/media/wpfshell-jumplist.png "Windows Media Player Jump List") Windows Media Player 跳躍清單Windows Media Player Jump List ## 設定 捷徑清單Configuring a Jump List 捷徑清單可以包含兩種類型的項目，和。Jump Lists can contain two types of items, a and a . A是程式的連結和是檔案的連結。A is a link to a program and a is a link to a file. 您可以藉由建立以視覺方式區隔跳躍清單中的項目沒有和指定。You can visually separate items in a Jump List by creating a that does not have a and specified. 這個空白將會顯示為水平線跳躍清單中。This empty will be displayed as a horizontal line in the Jump List. > [!NOTE] > 如果在指定的檔案類型未向您的應用程式，該檔案不會在跳躍清單中。If the type of the file specified in a is not registered with your application, the file will not appear in the Jump List. 例如，如果您將新增指向.txt 檔案，必須註冊您的應用程式，以處理.txt 檔案。For example, if you add a that points to a .txt file, your application must be registered to handle .txt files. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 檔案關聯的簡介](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178480)。For more information, see [Introduction to File Associations](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178480). 跳躍項目會放在類別。Jump items are placed into categories in the . 根據預設，會顯示在**工作**類別目錄。By default, a is displayed in the **Tasks** category. 或者，您可以指定針對。Alternatively, you can specify a for the . 您可以指定是否標準**最近**並**經常**類別會顯示在藉由設定和屬性。You can specify whether the standard **Recent** and **Frequent** categories are displayed in the by setting the and properties. 這些類別的內容由[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]殼層。The contents of these categories are managed by the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell. 因為這些類別可能包含許多相同的資料，您通常顯示一個或另一個則在您，但非兩者。Because these categories might contain much of the same data, you typically display one or the other in your , but not both. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 如果它們是透過通用檔案對話方塊開啟，或用來開啟應用程式透過檔案類型關聯，會自動管理最近的項目。automatically manages recent items if they are opened through a common file dialog box or used to open an application through file type association. 透過跳躍清單存取項目時，您可以通知[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]殼層來新增的項目**最近**藉由呼叫類別方法。When an item is accessed through the Jump List, you can notify the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell to add the item to the **Recent** category by calling the method. ## 套用至 Windows Shell 的捷徑清單Applying a Jump List to the Windows Shell 您無法直接存取殼層的跳躍清單，或讀取其內容到類別。You cannot access the shell's Jump List directly or read its contents into the class. 相反地，類別提供，您可以使用，並接著將套用至跳躍清單的表示法[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]殼層。Instead, the class provides a representation of a Jump List that you can work with, and then apply to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell. 您通常會建立並將它設定為第一次執行應用程式時的一次。You typically create a and set it one time when the application is first run. 不過，您可以修改或取代在執行階段。However, you can modify or replace the at run time. 當您已設定屬性，您必須套用Windows 殼層之前及其內容會出現在工作列跳躍清單中。When you have set the properties, you must apply the to the Windows shell before its contents appear in the taskbar Jump List. 這會自動完成時第一次會附加至應用程式，在 XAML 中或在呼叫方法。This is done automatically when the is first attached to an application, either in XAML or in a call to the method. 如果您修改的內容在執行階段，您必須呼叫方法，以將其目前的內容套用至 Windows shell。If you modify the contents of the at run time, you must call the method to apply its current contents to the Windows shell. ## 在 XAML 中設定捷徑清單Setting a Jump List in XAML A不會自動附加至物件。A is not automatically attached to an object. 您將附加至在 XAML 中使用的附加的屬性語法中的物件。You attach a to an object in XAML by using the attached property syntax. 類別會實作介面，以支援的 XAML 宣告。The class implements the interface to support XAML declaration of a . 如果是在 XAML 中宣告並附加至目前，它會自動套用至[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]殼層時初始化。If the is declared in XAML and attached to the current , it is automatically applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell when the is initialized. ## 設定和修改程式碼中的捷徑清單Setting and Modifying a Jump List in Code 您將附加要藉由呼叫靜態程式碼中的物件方法。You attach a to an object in code by calling the static method. 這也適用於至[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]殼層。This also applies the to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell. 若要修改在執行階段，您呼叫方法來取得目前連結至。To modify a at run time, you call the method to get the that is currently attached to an . 您已修改的屬性之後，您必須呼叫方法，以將變更套用至 Windows shell。After you have modified the properties of the , you must call the method to apply the changes to the Windows shell. > [!NOTE] > 您通常會建立一個連結至並套用至[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]殼層。You typically create one that is attached to the and applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell. 不過，您可以建立多個物件。However, you can create multiple objects. 只有一個一次可以套用至[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]shell 中，而且只有一一次可以與其相關聯。Only one at a time can be applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell, and only one at a time can be associated with an . .NET Framework 不需要這些是相同。The .NET Framework does not require that these be the same . > [!NOTE] > 這個類別包含在類別層級套用至所有成員的連結要求。This class contains a link demand at the class level that applies to all members. A立即呼叫端沒有完全信任權限時，會擲回。A is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full-trust permission. 如需安全性需求的詳細資訊，請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)並[繼承要求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For more information about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下列範例示範具有跳躍清單的應用程式。The following example shows an application with a Jump List. 應用程式有三個按鈕可讓您將工作加入目前的跳躍清單、 清除的跳躍清單中，內容和新的跳躍清單套用至應用程式。The application has three buttons that enable you to add a task to the current Jump List, clear the contents of the Jump List, and apply a new Jump List to the application. 下列範例示範如何宣告標記中。The following example shows how to declare a in markup. 包含兩個連結，另一個。The contains two links and one . 套用殼層將會失敗的應用程式未註冊為處理.txt 檔案的副檔名。Applying the to the shell will fail if the application is not registered to handle the .txt file name extension. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#000](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#000)] 下列範例示範的程式碼後置頁面`App.xaml`。The following example shows the code-behind page for `App.xaml`. 此程式碼會處理和事件。This code handles the and events. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml.cs#100)] 下列範例顯示用來建立應用程式使用者介面的標記。The following example shows the markup used to create the application user interface. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#300](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#300)] 下列範例示範的程式碼後置頁面`MainWindow.xaml`。The following example shows the code-behind page for `MainWindow.xaml`. 此程式碼示範如何修改、 清除和建立程序程式碼。This code demonstrates how to modify, clear, and create a in procedural code. 針對新跳躍清單中，靜態會呼叫方法來建立關聯目前的應用程式，並套用Windows 殼層。For the new Jump List, the static method is called to associate the with the current application and apply the to the Windows shell. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#200](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#200)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **最近**並**經常**類別經常包含許多相同的跳躍項目。The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items. 如此一來，應用程式通常會顯示這兩**最近**或**經常**跳躍清單中，但非兩者的類別。As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both.

span.span: Adds the specified item path to the **Recent** category of the Jump List.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容**最近**類別由 Windows shell。The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell. 若要顯示在跳躍清單中的最近使用的項目，請設定屬性設`true`。To display recently used items in the Jump List, set the property to `true`. 您可以呼叫方法來要求 Windows shell 加入至項目路徑**最近**項目清單。You can call the method to request that the Windows shell add an item path to the **Recent** items list. 如果您的應用程式未註冊為處理檔案類型的項目，它不會出現在**最近**清單和呼叫將會以無訊息模式失敗。If your application is not registered to handle the file type of the item, it will not appear in the **Recent** list and calls to will fail silently.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Apply() cil managed

summary.span: 將目前狀態中的 傳送至 Windows Shell。

span.span: Sends the to the Windows shell in its current state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將傳送的內容Windows 殼層處於目前狀態。The method sends the content of the to the Windows shell in its current state. 此呼叫完成之後，屬性已修改為包含 Windows shell 已成功新增到其工作列跳躍清單的項目。After this call is complete, the property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its taskbar Jump List. 您可以透過事件處理常式來存取移除的項目清單和事件。You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the and events. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何取得目前清除的內容和集合。The following example shows how to get the current and clear the contents of the collection. 方法接著會呼叫套用變更為 Windows shell。The method is then called to apply the changes to the Windows shell. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#230](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#230)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作介面，以支援的 XAML 宣告。The class implements the interface to support XAML declaration of a . 方法時才會呼叫是在 XAML 中宣告並附加至使用附加的屬性語法。The method is only called when the is declared in XAML and attached to an by using the attached property syntax. 您不從您的程式碼呼叫此方法。You do not call this method from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作介面，以支援的 XAML 宣告。The class implements the interface to support XAML declaration of a . 方法時才會呼叫是在 XAML 中宣告並附加至使用附加的屬性語法。The method is only called when the is declared in XAML and attached to an by using the attached property syntax. 您不從您的程式碼呼叫此方法。You do not call this method from your code. 方法具有相同的效果方法。The method has the same effect as the method. 內容傳送Windows 殼層處於目前狀態。 sends the content of the to the Windows shell in its current state. 此呼叫完成之後，屬性已修改為包含 Windows shell 已成功加入至跳躍清單的項目。After this call is complete, the property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its Jump List. 您可以透過事件處理常式來存取移除的項目清單和事件。You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the and events.

exception.span: 這個 呼叫沒有與 的呼叫配對。

span.span: This call to is not paired with a call to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以呼叫方法來取得目前與相關聯。You can call the method to get the currently associated with an . .NET Framework 不需要，這是目前套用至 Windows shell。The .NET Framework does not require that this be the that is currently applied to the Windows shell. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何取得與目前的應用程式相關聯。The following example shows how to get the associated with the current application. A新增至集合，並加入**最近**類別目錄。A is added to the collection and added to the **Recent** category. 會呼叫方法來套用更新Windows 殼層。The method is called to apply the updated to the Windows shell. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. value.span: 物件的集合，這些物件會顯示在跳躍清單中。

span.span: The collection of objects displayed in the Jump List.
The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 捷徑清單可以包含兩種類型的項目，和。Jump Lists can contain two types of items, a and a . A是程式的連結和是檔案的連結。A is a link to a program and a is a link to a file. 當建立時，集合是空的。When a is created, the collection is empty. 您可以將任何或物件加入集合。You can add any or objects to the collection. 集合只會包含已加入您的程式項目。The collection will only contain items that have been added by your program. 之後具有已成功呼叫傳遞給 Windows shell或是方法，集合將包含已成功新增至工作列跳躍清單的項目。After the has been passed to the Windows shell by a successful call to either the or methods, the collection will contain only the items that were successfully added to the taskbar Jump List. 未成功加入的項目會自集合。Items that were not successfully added are removed from the collection. 您可以透過事件處理常式來存取移除的項目清單和事件。You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the and events. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何取得目前清除的內容和集合。The following example shows how to get the current and clear the contents of the collection. 方法接著會呼叫套用變更為 Windows shell。The method is then called to apply the changes to the Windows shell. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#230](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#230)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容之後會套用至 Windows shell 中，屬性已修改為包含 Windows shell 已成功加入至跳躍清單的項目。After the contents of the are applied to the Windows shell, the property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its Jump List. 您可以透過事件處理常式來存取移除的項目清單和事件。You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the and events. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何處理的被拒絕的項目顯示在訊息方塊中的事件。The following example shows how to handle the event to display the rejected items in a message box. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指出是否在跳躍清單中顯示經常使用的項目。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether frequently used items are displayed in the Jump List.

value.span: 如果在跳躍清單中顯示經常使用的項目則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if frequently used items are displayed in the Jump List; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容**經常**類別由 Windows shell。The contents of the **Frequent** category are managed by the Windows shell. 若要在跳躍清單中顯示經常使用的項目，請設定屬性設`true`。To display frequently used items in the Jump List, set the property to `true`. **最近**並**經常**類別經常包含許多相同的跳躍項目。The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items. 如此一來，應用程式通常會顯示這兩**最近**或**經常**跳躍清單中，但非兩者的類別。As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both. ## Examples 下列範例所示設定為顯示**經常**類別目錄。The following example shows a configured to show the **Frequent** category. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#001](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#001)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容**最近**類別由 Windows shell。The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell. 若要在跳躍清單中顯示經常使用的項目，請設定屬性設`true`。To display frequently used items in the Jump List, set the property to `true`. **最近**並**經常**類別經常包含許多相同的跳躍項目。The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items. 如此一來，應用程式通常會顯示這兩**最近**或**經常**跳躍清單中，但非兩者的類別。As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both. 您可以呼叫方法來要求 Windows shell 加入項目來**最近**項目清單。You can call the method to request that the Windows shell add items to the **Recent** items list. 如果您的應用程式未註冊為處理項目的檔案名稱類型，它不會出現在**最近**清單和呼叫將會以無訊息模式失敗。If your application is not registered to handle the file name type of the item, it will not appear in the **Recent** list and calls to will fail silently. ## Examples 下列範例所示設定為顯示**最近**類別目錄。The following example shows a configured to show the **Recent** category. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#001](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#001)]
